text: Jean-Pierre Fragnière (18 September 1944 – 22 August 2021) was a Swiss academic and political scientist. He taught at the Haute école spécialisée de Lausanne and the University of Geneva. He founded the Institut universitaire âges et générations. He was Scientific Director from 1998 to 2009 in Sion. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Academics of the University of Geneva Category:Political scientists Category:People from Sion District
title: Jean-Pierre Fragnière
